data.message: Wow Em Wtf happen to you? I can't believe it took this for me to realize you are a part of the propaganda. Guess I didn't wanna believe it before. Fucking puppet.

replies.message: Keep cryin snowflake. Don't get any tears on the keyboard
Lol did you even watch his crybaby video. His "snowflake"ness is what pissed me off.
It's just another millionaire paid to perpetuate the cycle of segregation and anger. He's not delivering a message he's regurgitating the fuckin news.(And barely rapping)
What do you mean what happened to him?
He did his own thing in the past and you could feel his emotions thru his music. Again this is just regurgitated CNN, no fire, looks forced as fuck.
Royce Reece he used to shittalk Clinton and Bush this is what he's like
Puppet of what? You don't think Eminem is speaking his mind?
You're a moron and not even American, Royce.  So piss off
HAHAHAHAHAH what happened to HIM?  Snowflake, he's always been this dope.  Sounds like you got a terminal case of orange tongue.
Royce Reece you talking about trump about a millionaire dividing us?
So you missed him trashing Bush and Clinton, then?  Guess you only started to care when you flat-out got disowned.  Bravo.

Nerp. Been bumping em since infinite. Just pay enough attention to see fake when I see it. He put effort and passion in his Bush dis. This is just trying to be relevant. Sounds desperate like a grown women wit a Pokemon.
his bush dis was heart felt, this is just a pussy meth head from detroit crying on the internet like the pathetic snowflake he is

I'm a  Canadian not a Trump supporter. Not an Em supporter anymore either.  You can't watch tv or go on social media without seeing slims ground breaking message. The fact that none of you notice that you're being told what to think is fucked. Clearly no critical thinking in the ole school system. And PS Trump didn't start the issue with N.K. That was years ago.
